div.ab: " Horos, son of the older Atilon, 4 dr. with the addition,;Horos, likewise, the younger, 4 dr. with the addition,;Pam..eus, son of M[.]llko() the younger 4 dr. with the addition,;Petermouthis, son of Psenobastis, 8 dr. with the addition,;216,;another 26th, Harmiysis, son of Amounis, 28 dr. with the addition,;Ptolemais, son of Chethos, 4 dr. with the addition,;Psa...tisneus, son of Praxias, 24 dr.,;Panetbys, son of Petemounis, 28 dr.,;Ammonis, son of the older Ko(), 12 dr.,;Herakles, son of Mysthes the older, son of Phanos, 12 dr. with the addition,;Mysthas, son of Herakles, 12 dr.,;Herakles, son of Proganos (?), son of Laro(), 8 dr.,;Theon, son of Hareotos, 4 dr. with the addition,;Hatres, son of Hareotos, 4 dr. with the addition,;Mysthas, son of Hareotos, 8 dr. with the addition,;Horion, likewise, 40 dr. with the addition,;. . . ., son of Apion, 12 dr.,;Apion, son of Apion, 8 dr.,;. . . .n, son of Hareotos, 8 dr.,;180,;1st of the Epagomenai, ;Isidoros, son of Peteuchos, 16 dr.,;[..]eteon, son of Ischyrion, 36 dr. with the addition,;Lysimachos, son of Sambas, 28 dr.,;[..]tes, likewise, 12 dr.,;. . tes, likewise, his son, 16 dr.,;Herakles,likewise, 20 dr.,;Pamsneus, son of Petosiris, 4 dr.,;Papesneus, son of Ermois, 44 dr.,;Hatres, son of Ischyrion, 4 dr.,;Petemounis, son of Ischyrion, 4 dr.,;. . . . ., son of Harentotos, 12 dr.,;. . . .tos, son of Satabous, 4 dr.,;Petosiris, son of Psenobastis, 8 dr. with the addition,;. . . .ous, likewise, 8 dr.,;P...phros, son of Papous, 8 dr.,;.....(), son of Papous, 12 dr.,;Apynchis, son of Marres, 32dr."
